message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking $200 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to offer $160 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I could come down a bit to $180. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $170 for the product. I hope this is within your consideration.
